about_the_game:
Embark on a thrilling adventure filled with espionage and intrigue in Super Spy Academy, a captivating narrative-driven game set in a prestigious private university overtaken by sinister forces. As Leo, a determined freshman, players must navigate through a series of challenging puzzles and obstacles to uncover the truth behind the mysterious disappearance of his brother and the infiltration of the academy by the villainous "Super Villain Academy."

With the help of QBear, an AI companion, players will explore a rich 3D world teeming with secrets and surprises, interacting with unique characters along the way. From navigating through six diverse areas with their own distinct themes to solving over 15 puzzles scattered throughout the academy, every step taken brings players closer to unraveling the gripping mystery at the heart of Super Spy Academy.

Featuring fully voice-acted dialogue, captivating visual novel-style storytelling elements, and engaging mini-games to test your spy skills, Super Spy Academy offers an immersive gameplay experience unlike any other. Whether playing with a mouse and keyboard or a gamepad, players will find themselves immersed in a world where every clue leads closer to the truth. Dive into a world of suspense and embark on an unforgettable journey to save the academy from its perilous fate.

Key Features:

  • Lots of characters to interact with
  • Explore 6 diverse areas, each with its own theme and challenges
  • Solve over 15 puzzles to progress through the story
  • Fully voice-acted cast brings the characters to life
  • Experience visual novel-style storytelling elements
  • Navigate a rich 3D world filled with secrets
  • Engage in mini-games to test your spy skills
  • Compatible with mouse and keyboard, as well as gamepad controls

content_descriptors.notes: Super Spy Academy involves a university for spies that has been overtaken by villanous forces. Faculty and students are held captive in rooms. There are scenes that involve the player using a "hologram blaster" to shoot holograms. Holograms will also actively try to attack the player.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Processor or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 512MB RAM and Webgl enabled
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Window 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Processor or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 512MB RAM and Webgl enabled
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Join Leo in Super Spy Academy! Uncover a mysterious plot at a prestigious university, solve puzzles, interact with unique characters, and explore diverse areas to save the school from a perilous fate.
